articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Kumsusan Memorial Palace
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with members of the NDC and commanding officers of the KPA, visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace at 0:00 on Wednesday. 
					 He was accompanied by Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, General of the KPA Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, General of the KPA Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Department of the KPA, Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Il Chol, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, staff members of the Supreme Command of the KPA and other general officers of the KPA. 
					
					 He together with the above-said commanding officers of the NDC and the KPA paid homage to President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: National Memorial Service Held
articles.content:
National Memorial Service Held
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service was solemnly held here Wednesday to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il was present there.
					
					 Also present there were senior officials of the party, the army and the state, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, those who had the honor of being received by the President, those related to his revolutionary activities, heroes, persons of merits and working people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants in the service observed a moment's silence in memory of the President.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a memorial address.
					
					 In his memorial address he said that Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly great man whom the Korean people greeted and held in high esteem for the first time in the history spanning five thousand years, the founder of socialist Korea, the father of the nation and the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea and clearly indicated the way to be followed by the times and revolution, a legendary hero who started the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and saved the destiny of the country and the nation with arms of revolution and an invincible and iron-willed commander who ushered in a new era of the anti-imperialist struggle. 
					
					 The President was a distinguished statesman who built the socialist state centred on the popular masses for the first time in history and laid a solid foundation for the eternal prosperity of the country and the nation, a lodestar of national reunification who showed the most correct way of national reunification and worked his heart and soul to achieve it till the last moments of his life and a universally recognized political elder who made a great contribution to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 His revolutionary life was a great life of the genuine leader of the people and tender-hearted father who made a history of the warmest love and dedication to the people, guided by his noble idea of believing in people as in Heaven.
					
					 His brilliant life and feats will last forever along with the eternal prosperity of the country and the nation and the victorious advance of the cause of human liberation and he will always be alive in the hearts of the army and people of the DPRK and humankind.
					
					His revolutionary idea and cause are being successfully carried forward and accomplished by Kim Jong Il in all fields, the speaker noted, underscoring the need to wage a dynamic struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and thus translate the desire of the President into a brilliant reality, make a hundred-year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea a history of prosperity to be always recorded in the history of the country and bring earlier the reunification of the country and the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The WPK and the army and people of the DPRK will take firm hold on the revolutionary idea of the President as the eternal guiding idea and embody it in all fields, preserve and develop the undying revolutionary traditions established by him and his feats as the treasures of eternal value of the country and the nation generation after generation and thus eternally glorify the history of the Korean revolution as his glorious revolutionary history and the history of the victory of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, the speaker declared, underlining the need to decisively shatter the anti-reunification moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique, successfully materialize the three charters for national reunification and thereby surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification. 
					
					 He called for developing the foreign relations in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and making a positive contribution to building an independent and peaceful new world. 
					
					 Memorial services were solemnly held in provinces, cities, counties and complexes today on the same occasion.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the party and state, a chairman of a friendly party, leading officials of the party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions Wednesday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet was laid before the statue of the President.
					
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung is immortal".
					
					 The participants paid respect in humble reverence to the President, the founder of socialist Korea and the father of the nation, looking up to his statue.
					
					 They paid respectful homage to the President who achieved the historic cause of national liberation and built a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, on this land and laid the eternal foundation for national prosperity.
					
					 Among the visitors to the palace on the same day were anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people from all walks of life.
					
					 Meanwhile, the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps, representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests also visited the palace Wednesday and paid homage to the President.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid by Chinese
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid by Chinese
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, staying in the DPRK, laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Wednesday to pay tribute to him on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung in various parts of the country on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise.
					 An endless stream of people visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang in boundless reverence and yearning for him.
					
					 Seen before the statue was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Placed before the statue were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, social bodies, ministries, national institutions and scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media institutions, industrial establishments, schools, etc. 
					
					 Also placed were floral baskets in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans and foreigners. 
					
					 The attendants paid respects in profound reverence for the President, calling back with deep emotion his brilliant revolutionary life and undying exploits.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children from across the country visited the statues of the President in their residential areas. They laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues and paid homage to him.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert Held
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Remembrance concert "Father of People" was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Wednesday on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.  
					 Among the audience were senior party, army and state officials, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and persons of merits, working people in Pyongyang, overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreigners related to the revolutionary activities of the President, diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 The concert that began with a female solo and chorus "Everlasting Smile of the President" made the theater pervade with boundless reverence for the peerlessly great man. 
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers of diverse genres such as "Song of the Amnok River", "Nostalgia", "Song of Ploughing" and "Song of the Sea," favorite songs of the President. 
					
					In such numbers as soprano "Red Chol Pass" and female octet chorus "Father Is on the Frontline" the performers enthusiastically sang of the reality in which the history of the sun is given steady continuity thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has defended the dignity of the country and provided the people with happiness through his tireless forced march for field guidance and successfully carried out the behests of the President.
					
					 Diverse events including remembrance meetings and concerts took place in various parts of the country.

articles.title: Father of Nation Always among People
articles.content:
Father of Nation Always among People
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The immortal services rendered by President Kim Il Sung who made a new history of creation and construction for the people and established the man-centered socialist Korea with his outstanding and seasoned leadership will be conveyed down through generations.
					 He initiated the great cause for the people and blew any fabulous wealth which went against the interest of the people. This great fatherly love of his has provided all the happiness of the people.
					
					 Uam in the northern tip of the country is marked with the footprint of the President who pushed his car on a muddy path, saying that he should go and see wherever people were living. And a rural village on the west coastal plain is associated with a touching story about the President who waited for daybreak outdoors, exposing himself to cold dew, lest that the family of a house wake from a sound sleep.
					
					 He at one time crossed a river by a wooden boat and went to a co-op farm to indicate the way for peasants to improve their living by themselves and on another occasion he ate a boiled maize ear as substitute food. As seen above, he had covered the road of devotion for the happiness of the people throughout his life.
					
					 He grasped unreservedly greasy hands of workers at a factory and when officials held him back from entering dangerous working site, he went into the site without hesitation, saying why he couldn't go there where workers were always working. Sometimes he transplanted rice seedlings together with peasants on a paddy field and detailed the farming method, walking along a ridge between rice fields.
					
					 Thanks to his devotion to the people, such edifices named after "people" as the People's Palace of Culture and the Grand People's Study House have come into appearances and a people's paradise has been built on this land.
					
					 Indeed, the President worked without sparing himself and with heart and soul for the construction of a rich and powerful country whose master is the people and visited factories and rural and fishing villages for the happiness of the people in all weathers, putting his emphatic stamp in every nook and corner of the country.
					
					 The Korean people, therefore, will keep deep in their hearts for ever the boundlessly benevolent image of the President who used to carefully listen to the simple words of the people, regarding them as his teacher.
					
					 The President was the only great father of the people and peerless great man in history, who devoted his whole life to the people, finding himself among people to bestow warmest affection on them.

articles.title: Realizing Kim Il Sung's Desire for Building Thriving Nation Called for
articles.content:
Realizing Kim Il Sung's Desire for Building Thriving Nation Called for
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers today editorially call for bringing into full bloom President Kim Il Sung's desire for building a great prosperous and powerful nation on this land on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise. 
					 It was the noble will and desire of Kim Il Sung to build a thriving nation on this land where there is powerful national strength, everything thrives and people lead an affluent life with no more to desire in the world, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					The noble will of Kim Il Sung for building a thriving nation which he regarded as his lifelong motto till the last moments of his life is being successfully materialized by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the unshakable resolution and will of Kim Jong Il to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation at any cost in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il set an example of noble moral obligation unprecedented in the world history and worked hard to make the country, the biggest legacy left by Kim Il Sung, rich and prosperous, despite all trials and difficulties. These immortal feats performed by    Kim Jong Il are shining brightly in the history of the country. 
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il who is upholding the President's cause of the nation building, a torch of a new great revolutionary surge was kindled on this land and a vigorous drive for effecting great innovation and making a leap forward is underway, accelerating the day of victory when the gate of a thriving nation will be opened.  
					
					 As long as there is Kim Jong Il the undying revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung and the feats performed by him for nation-building are brilliantly shining along with the victorious advance of the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation and they always inspire the army and people of the DPRK to carve out  a rosy morrow. Kim Il Sung's idea and line of nation-building serve as an ever-victorious banner of building a thriving nation and his revolutionary life encourages the army and people out in the drive for building a thriving nation to give full play to their patriotic zeal like an erupting volcano. The epoch-making miracles are being worked on this land thanks to the faith, pluck and matchless mettle possessed by Kim Il Sung. A harmonious whole of Kim Il Sung and the people is being further consolidated in the stirring reality in which the people advance toward the bright future of a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, holding Kim Il Sung in 
					
					 high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to make a dynamic struggle for accomplishing the cause of Kim Il Sung, the revolutionary cause of Juche, under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: 15th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Brazil and Mexico
articles.content:
15th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Brazil and Mexico
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Communist Party issued a bulletin on June 30 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Saying that President of the DPRK Kim Il Sung has received gifts, orders, medals and honorary titles from different countries though nearly 15 years have passed since his demise, an article of the bulletin introduced the International Friendship Exhibition House where many gifts presented to him by foreigners, south Koreans and overseas compatriots are displayed.
					
					 Those who presented gifts to him are different people but all of these gifts tell the story that the President would be immortal along with humankind, the bulletin noted, adding that there are in the Central Zoo and the Central Botanical Garden a lot of gift plants and animals presented to him by different countries and international organizations after his demise.
					
					 The bulletin stressed that the President is immortal as he is always revered by the world people.
					
					 A bulletin issued by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 29 carried a portrait of the smiling President and noted that he enjoyed absolute trust and support of the people all his life.

articles.title: Congratulations to Malawian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Malawian FM
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, on July 6 sent a congratulatory message to Dr. Eta Elizabeth Banda on her appointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Malawi.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished her good health and happiness and success in the performance of her new duty.

articles.title: Lee Group's Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Group's Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations, citizens and members of bereaved families of evacuees in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on July 4 at which they denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for the killing of evacuees.
					 The speakers at the rally recalled that people from all walks of life have waged a strenuous struggle demanding the probe into the truth behind the incident and the punishment of the prime movers of the murder since the tragic incident in Ryongsan in January.
					
					 The Lee group, however, has blocked memorial services for the dead and let the police commit violence against the participants in the protests, they charged.
					
					 They angrily accused the fascist police of making even preparations for a man-killing operation to trigger off the second Ryongsan tragedy.
					
					 One should never forget the tragedy in which innocent people were ruthlessly killed in Ryongsan by the present "government", they declared, urging Lee to make an apology for the murder and punish its prime movers.

articles.title: Puppet Police's Repressive Drill Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Police's Repressive Drill Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Committee against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 3 at which it denounced the puppet police for staging a repressive drill after creating an atmosphere reminiscent of the scene of tragic death in Ryongsan.
					 The speakers at the press conference accused the police of staging the above-said repressive drill and unhesitatingly making it public through media. 
					
					  They noted with irrepressible resentment that the police not only caused the Ryongsan tragedy and blocked all the memorial services for the dead but is now making desperate efforts to repeat the same murder. 
					
					 The police is insisting that it was not a drill to repeat the Ryongsan tragedy but it created the same atmosphere as that reigned on the scene of murder and displayed even  the slogan "Guarantee the right to existence" before hurling its "commando" into the scene, they noted, adding that this suffices to clearly show what aim it sought.
					
					 A press release read out then assailed the police for getting evermore undisguised in its fascist rampage after labeling the people's struggle for the right to existence "terrorism" and demanded that the chief of the Seoul District Police Office be fired at once.

articles.title: Adherence to Three Principles of National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Adherence to Three Principles of National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on July 4 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement in which it declared it would invariably adhere to the three principles of national reunification in the future, too, once again deeply grasping the historic significance of the three principles.
					 The statement said that to aspire after national independence, reunification and equality is the trend of the present times.
					
					 It called upon the seventy million Koreans to turn out in the struggle to thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration that reflected the three principles of national reunification.   
					
					 Meanwhile, the organization in a statement issued on July 3 denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its fascist suppression of the Teachers Union of south Korea.

articles.title: Puppet Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism's Wild Act Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism's Wild Act Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations comprising people of various circles including the Citizens Solidarity for Media Reform, the Women's Solidarity for Environment, the People's Action for the Cancellation of the Canal Project, the Federation of Women's Organizations and the Solidarity of Persons of Culture held a press conference in Seoul on July 2 at which they denounced the puppet Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism for having taken the lead in implementing misrule of traitor Lee Myung Bak. 
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the ministry of conducting a massive propaganda offensive as evidenced by the production of animation files showing the project of improving four large rivers proposed by Lee and the compulsory show of them at cinema houses.
					
					 Expressing bitter indignation at the anachronistic behavior of the ministry keen on acting as the mouthpiece for the "government" while lending no ear to the voices of the people, they urged the minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism to make an apology for his wrongdoing. 
					
					 The improvement project of four large rivers, a product of Lee's arrogance and self-importance, is being rebuffed by the people as it calls for spending huge money collected from the people as taxes on destroying the natural environment, they said. 
					
					 They stressed that the organizations in the fields of women, culture and environment would join all the people in their positive struggle to check the show of the files.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Misrule Blasted by Koreans in Canada
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Misrule Blasted by Koreans in Canada
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Korean Christians in Canada published a declaration on the situation accusing traitor Lee Myung Bak of his undemocratic rule on July 1. 
					 The declaration deplored that the successes made in the struggle for democracy thanks to the blood shed by so many people are now being brought to naught by the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea and peace is being threatened and those who advocated justice are meeting deaths with grudge unsettled.
					
					 The declaration urged Lee Myung Bak to reflect on the crimes he committed by causing the tragedy in which evacuees in Ryongsan were burned to death and driving the former "president" to a suicide.
					
					 It also urged the south Korean authorities to sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, landmarks of reunification, instead of stoking conflict and antagonism between the south and the north.
					
					 It demanded Lee Myung Bak roll back his policy in favor of the rich only, opt for settling the issues of labor and people's living and immediately put an end to projects for improving four rivers which are opposed by the majority of people and halt the moves to railroad "Lee Myung Bak's evil bills."

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Philippines
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Philippines
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A Philippines preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed with due ceremony on June 20.
					 Nelia Sancho, executive chairwoman of the Philippines-DPRK Friendship Society, and Norma G. Binas, vice-president of the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula, were elected co-chairpersons of the preparatory committee at the ceremony. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as seminar, photo exhibition and film show in the period until 2012. 
					
					 An appeal to the friendship and solidarity organizations with the Korean people in different countries of the world was adopted there.
					
					 It said that national and regional preparatory committees are now being inaugurated in different parts of the world including Asia, Europe and Americas to conduct brisk activities to laud the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, till 2012. 
					
					 It called for vigorously conducting an international campaign for inaugurating the preparatory committees commemorating the centenary of birth of the President to significantly commemorate the centenary of his birth worldwide and for forming regional preparatory committees within this year and an international preparatory committee next year with a view to putting their activities on an organized and dynamic basis. 
					
					 It underscored the need for the national, regional and international preparatory committees to introduce the life and exploits of the President through colorful political and cultural activities including meetings, film shows, book and photo exhibitions and lectures and pay highest tribute to the President so that the history of the President might be given eternal continuity. 
					
					It appealed to the organizations and figures of different countries of the world to make a tangible contribution to erecting the statues of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and dispatch their delegations to their unveiling ceremonies and an "international joint meeting to commemorate the one hundredth year of Kim Il Sung's Korea" to be held in 2012 to further deepen the bonds with the Korean people.

articles.title: Cause Clarified on the Spot
articles.content:
Cause Clarified on the Spot
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- One day in April of Juche 60 (1971) President Kim Il Sung visited a farm.
					Saluted by officials of the farm, he said that he came there to discuss vegetable problem with them and suggested to look round vegetable fields first.
					
					At a vegetable field, he asked an elderly woman peasant, who was transplanting spring vegetable sprouts in the field, from when vegetables were cultivated in the field.
					
					She said that it had been used as a vegetable field from many years ago as it was situated in a land lower than other fields. He was absorbed in thinking for a while. And then, he asked her whether vegetables grew well in the previous year.
					
					After hesitating to answer, she said that the vegetables grew well first but they were getting rotten after the rainy season only to reap bad harvest.
					
					He looked round the field once again as if there was something to be guessed and surveyed closely its topographical conditions. And he, with confidence, said that vegetables of the field got rotten because it was in lowland and people thought that as vegetables demanded much water, they would grow well in lowlands but the thought was wrong.
					
					He went on to say that as the vegetable plot is located in a low wet land, vegetables grew well in the dry season but rainwater stood in the plot even after a light rain and vegetables grew rotten from the root.
					
					Listening to him, officials of the farm and peasants were deeply impressed by his words.
					
					That day President Kim Il Sung gave a clear-cut answer to the problem the peasants who had cultivated vegetables for generations did not solve, thus brightly lighting the way of vegetable farming.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il rinde homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il rinde homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 8 el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan con los miembros del CDN y los comandantes del EPC.
					  Entre los acompanantes figuraban el submariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito Kim Jong Gak, primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el submariscal Kim Il Chol,  primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los miembros del mando de las operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema y otros generales.
					
					  El Dirigente rindio tributo al Presidente junto con sus acompanantes.

articles.title: Acto central en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto central en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad hoy en esta capital el acto central de recordacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung con motivo del XV aniversario de su fallecimiento.
					  En la ocasion estuvo presente el Dirigente        Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Asistieron al conclave los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de organos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los ex-combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los hombres recibidos por el Presidente y relacionados con el, los heroes, los benemeritos, los trabajadores capitalinos, compatriotas residentes en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung es el gran hombre simpar, a quien el pueblo coreano acogio y enaltecio por primera vez en la historia nacional de cinco milenios, el fundador de la Corea socialista, el padre de la nacion y el eterno Sol del Juche, comenzo el orador y continuo:
					
					  El Presidente fue distinguido ideologo y teorico quien creo la inmortal idea Juche e ilumino el camino a seguir por la epoca y la revolucion, heroe legendario quien inicio la autoctona causa de la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar) y salvo con las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias el destino de la patria y la nacion e invencible general de acero que abrio la nueva epoca de la lucha antiimperialista.
					
					  Tambien, fue destacado politico quien construyo por primera vez en la historia el Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares y sento la firme base para la prosperidad eterna del pais y la nacion, y la estrella salvadora de la reunificacion de la patria quien ilumino el camino mas correcto y realizo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida todos los esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales por cumplir esa causa.
					
					 Ademas, fue reconocido veterano de la politica mundial quien hizo gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia en todo el mundo.
					
					  La vida revolucionaria del Presidente fue la sagrada de verdadero lider y padre generoso del pueblo quien partiendo de su noble ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo), escribio la historia del amor mas calido y abnegacion mas grande por el pueblo.
					
					  Su brillante vida y hazanas seran eternas junto con la infinita prosperidad de la patria y la nacion y el avance victorioso de la causa de liberacion de la humanidad y el vivira para siempre en el corazon del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y de la humanidad.
					
					  La idea y la causa revolucionarias del Presidente se llevan adelante y se van cumpliendo en todos los aspectos por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Hay que librar energicamente la lucha por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista para realizar con mayor satisfaccion el deseo del Presidente, convertir los 100 anos de la Corea de       Kim Il Sung en la era de prosperidad y enriquecimiento digna de registrarse eternamente en los anales de la patria y lograr lo mas pronto posible el dia de la reunificacion de la patria y la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  El Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el ejercito y el pueblo materializaran totalmente la idea revolucionaria del Presidente tomandola firmemente como eterna guia directriz y desarrollaran de generacion en generacion las inmortales tradiciones y hazanas revolucionarias logradas por el considerandolas como patrimonio eterno de la patria y la nacion.
					
					  De este modo, llevaran adelante la historia de la revolucion coreana como la gloriosa historia revolucionaria del Presidente y la del triunfo de la idea Juche y la del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  Tambien, cumpliran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria frustrando tajantemente las maniobras anti-reunificacion de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la camarilla titere surcoreana e implementando con exito las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					  Ademas, desarrollaran las relaciones exteriores segun el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y contribuiran activamente a la construccion de un nuevo mundo independiente y pacifico.
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 15 del fallecimiento del Presidente    Kim Il Sung, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron hoy el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					Fue depositado ante la estatua del Presidente un cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En la cinta del cesto se notaban las dedicatorias de "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung sera inmortal"
					
					Los visitantes rindieron homenaje ante la estatua y el cuerpo del Presidente, fundador de la Corea socialista y Padre de la nacion, quien cumplio la historica causa de la liberacion de la patria, edifico en la tierra patria la potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y autodefensiva y echo el cimiento eterno de la prosperidad nacional.
					
					Este dia, visitaron dicho palacio tambien los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los trabajadores de distintos sectores.
					
					Hicieron otro tanto el Cuerpo Diplomatico y el de Agregados Militares, los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.

articles.title: Depositados cestos de flores ante estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Depositados cestos de flores ante estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung
  Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del XV aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente   Kim Il Sung los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares depositaron los cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente   Kim Il Sung en distintas localidades.
					  Hacia la colina Mansu de esta capital corrian las olas humanas con el infinito sentimiento de respeto y veneracion hacia el Presidente.
					
					  Alli estaba colocado el cesto de flores enviado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.  
					
					  Ante la estatua de bronce fueron depositados los cestos de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, las fabricas, empresas y escuelas.
					
					  Ademas, se hicieron asi los cestos de flores a nombre de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los coreanos en ultramar y los extranjeros.
					
					  Los participantes rindieron tributo al Presidente recordando con emocion la brillante vida revolucionaria e inmortales hazanas de este.
					
					  Por otra parte, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de distintos lugares lo hicieron ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente erguidas en sus respectivas localidades.
